componentConfigs.title: Total Items
componentConfigs.description: Total number of information product found

componentConfigs.title: Languages
componentConfigs.description: Total number of information products only accessible as by publishers specifications.

componentConfigs.title: Authers
componentConfigs.description:
Total number of Authors involved with the information
product found

componentConfigs.text:
Create your query by entering choices in one of
more filters below, click on ICONS:loop to clear your query.

componentConfigs.title: Info Products by Type
componentConfigs.description:
All the available information products are represented here and disaggregated by Type.
                    You can toggle on/off individual type of visualization in the list at the right side of
                    the graphic. Click on ICONS:view_headline to export this graphic, click on ICONS:expand_less to collapse it.

componentConfigs.title: Info Products by Subject
componentConfigs.description:
Top Subjects tags for all the information products are represented here, the greater the word,
the higher the number of information. Products tagged to that specific Subject. Click on ICONS:view_headline
to export this graphic, click on ICONS:expand_less to collapse it.
